name: Heavily Protected
description:
Pilot your Hot-Air Balloon through waves of enemies, equipping your powerful turrets to defend you. But the more weapons you add the heavier your balloon becomes.

Can you stay afloat?

Made in 7 days for the Blackthornprod Game Jam #3 Theme: Less is More My take on this was to make the fewer weapons you have equipped the more lift your Balloon has
